Package com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.util

Class CatalogueUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.util.CatalogueUtils
  • public class CatalogueUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class CatalogueUtils contains static utility methods to work with catalogue data.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public static void validate​(Book book)
                     throws DbException,
                            DaoException,
                            ValidationException
        validate(Book book) method checks whether Book instance is valid e.i. all necessary fields are present, ISBN is valid, and there is no record in the database with the tag field.
        Parameters:
        book - instance of Book to validate.
        Throws:
        DbException - is thrown if SQLException was thrown.
        DaoException - is thrown if DAO cannot be instantiated.
        ValidationException - is thrown if validation failed.

      • validate

        public static void validate​(CatalogueEntity entity)
                     throws DbException,
                            DaoException,
                            ValidationException
        validate(CatalogueEntity entity) method checks whether CatalogueEntity instance is valid e.i. all necessary fields are present and there is no record in the database with the tag field.
        Parameters:
        entity - instance of CatalogueEntity to validate.
        Throws:
        DbException - is thrown if SQLException was thrown.
        DaoException - is thrown if DAO cannot be instantiated.
        ValidationException - is thrown if validation failed.

      • validateIsbn

        public static boolean validateIsbn​(java.lang.String isbn)
        validateIsbn method checks whether ISBN is valid.
        Parameters:
        isbn - ISBN to be validated.
        Returns:
        true if ISBN is valid, false otherwise.

      • setBookParameters

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> setBookParameters​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Method setBookParameters is a utility method which retrieves necessary parameters from GET request and puts them to an instance of Map which later will be processed by SQL SELECT query.
        Parameters:
        request - instance of HttpServletRequest to process.
        Returns:
        Map with necessary entries.

      • setOrderParameters

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> setOrderParameters​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Method setOrderParameters is a utility method which retrieves necessary parameters from GET request and puts them to an instance of Map which later will be processed by SQL SELECT query.
        Parameters:
        request - instance of HttpServletRequest to process.
        Returns:
        Map with necessary entries.

      • setDetailsFromRequest

        public static void setDetailsFromRequest​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                         CatalogueEntity catalogueEntity,
                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​Language> languages)
                                  throws BadRequestException
        Method setDetailsFromRequest is a utility method which retrieves necessary parameters from GET request and puts them to an instance of Map which later will be processed by SQL SELECT query.
        Parameters:
        request - an instance of HttpServletRequest to process.
        catalogueEntity - an instance of CatalogueEntity to process.
        languages - Map of languages.
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - is thrown if some request parameters are invalid.

      • setDetailsFromEntity

        public static void setDetailsFromEntity​(java.sql.PreparedStatement preparedStatement,
                                        CatalogueEntity catalogueEntity)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method setDetailsFromEntity is a utility method which sets PreparedStatement parameters from an instance of CatalogueEntity.
        Parameters:
        preparedStatement - an instance of PreparedStatement to be set.
        catalogueEntity - instance of CatalogueEntity where necessary data is contained.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - is thrown if PreparedStatement cannot be set or executed.

      • processCatalogueEntityDetails

        public static void processCatalogueEntityDetails​(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                                 CatalogueEntity entity,
                                                 java.lang.String query)
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        MySQL specific method which updates or inserts depending on the query names and descriptions to one of tables publisher_descriptions, category_descriptions.
        Parameters:
        connection - an instance of Connection to reach the database.
        entity - an instance of CatalogueEntity containing necessary data.
        query - SQL query to be executed.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - is thrown if SQLException is thrown while processing the query.
